long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever been so lazy that you can't even be troubled to hit the "Skip Intro" button while watching Netflix? Have you been sitting on your couch wishing for that "Next Episode" countdown to just hit 0? Well me too, and here's the solution! This simple extension automatically skips intros and outros. No more waiting for those pesky 15 second countdowns to be over. This extension will help you truly reach the pinnacle of laziness.
